name: A Freca Menta - SodorJam 2023
description:
A prototype version of a simple Castlevania-inspired platformer created by Arisuki and glacier for SodorJam 2023!

 * Move with either the arrow keys or WASD!
 * Tap down to drop through platforms!
 * Press and hold up or down to look in that direction!
 * Find and touch blue flowers to activate a checkpoint!
 * Change music volume with PLUS and MINUS!
 * Refresh to play again! <w<;;;

This is a prototype version and is liable to be updated as time goes on.

Features at the moment:
 - Checkpoints!
 - Secret areas!
 - Music by Arisuki!
 - Spikes!
 - Romania!
